name: PreventiveCareServicesGroupCounseling
title: Preventive Care Services Group Counseling
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for encounters for group counseling services.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Encounter.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent an encounter for preventive medicine counseling and/or risk factor reduction intervention(s) in a group setting.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
